name: Lightbulb
body:
### Welcome to Lightbulb
Lightbulb is an instant messenger for Symbian based on [MeegIM](https://projects.developer.nokia.com/meegim) and licensed on GPL 3 license. It is written using Symbian C++, Qt and QtQuick. Also uses qxmpp library for XMPP support.
Btw. it's pretty cool and you can use it to chat with people and stuff!

### Why would I need this anyway?
Lightbulb IM can be used for Google Talk/Hangouts, Facebook Chat and is compatible with probably any XMPP server. It's beautiful and should handle your text messages correctly. Wanna use it for something else than XMPP? You should familiarize yourself with transports. I use it for Gadu-Gadu myself. :)

### Authors and Contributors
Core developer of this software is @ksiazkowicz. This piece of code reuses some bits and pieces from Tweetian app by @dicksonleong and was coded with some very useful help and support from @huellif (we actually had to go through some poorly docummented Symbian APIs). 

### Where to get it?
You can get latest releases from my GitHub, [here](https://github.com/ksiazkowicz/lightbulb/releases) or from [Symbian Store](http://symbianstore.symbian-developers.net).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
